p: The PSCs fabricated in the present report have a cell size of 1 cm × 1 cm and is shown in the inset of Fig. 7(d). In it, a black mask with an active area of 0.314 sq.cm has been used for measuring the photovoltaic performance under simulated AM 1.5 solar irradiation at an intensity of 100 mW/cm 2 measured at room temperature and the champion device-1 c of the lot, exhibited a PCE of 8.52% under ambient atmosphere.
